title: Bombay bubble and squeak
ingredients: ['oil for frying', '2 teaspoons cumin seeds', '1 teaspoons mustard seeds', '1 teaspoon kalonji (nigella) seed', '400g onions, chopped', 'minced garlic or garlic puree to taste', '600g raw cabbage (green, sweetheart or savoy), chopped', '600g cold cooked potatoes, cut into bite sized pieces', '2 teaspoon garam masala', '1 pinch cayenne pepper (optional)', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
